name: Micro Golf (RaBalder)
description:
Very simple Golf game that I created just to finish and publish a game. This is my first published title and it was made in just a few hours. So don't expect much. This is just the very first MVP of the game. I may add more holes, stages and features in future iterations.


Controls:

Mouse or swipe on screen to aim/shoot, the longer you drag the harder you hit.

Credits for music:
"Late Night Radio" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
